text: Walter Franco (6 January 1945 – 24 October 2019) was a Brazilian rock singer, guitarist, record producer and composer.[ Allmusic credits] In 1998 he worked with Rosa Passos for their debut album Especial Tom Jobim. His 1975 album Revolver was No. 50 on Rolling Stones list of the Top 100 Brazilian albums.Brazilian albums He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. Other ablums include Respire Fundo, Vela Aberta, Walter Franco and Tutano. Franco died on 24 October 2019 at a São Paulo hospital from a stroke, aged 74. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Singers from São Paulo Category:Brazilian guitarists Category:Rock guitarists Category:Brazilian composers Category:Brazilian record producers Category:Musicians from São Paulo
title: Walter Franco
